name: Tetrilibrium
description:
Welcome to Tetrilibrium!  A quick little game about using tetriminos to beat puzzles and get to the end of the stage. Made for Ludum Dare #49

You'll need to be careful when using your pieces, one little mistake is all it takes to make gravity do it's work and bring them down. Hope you enjoy our game and good luck creating your unstable path to next stage!

  • A / D - Move Character
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Q / E - Change Piece
  • Left Mouse Button - Select and Drop Piece
  • Right Mouse Button - Rotate Piece
  • R - Restart Stage
  • Melancholia - @MelancholiaDev (Twitter) - Programming, Artist and Game Design
  • Guilherme Miotto - @guimiott0 (Instagram) - Sound Design
  • Ana - @anap_pulsar (Instagram) - Sound Designer
  • Marlon - @marlongtr (Instagram) - Main Music Track
